data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LJYmUzLob3EQ7kNvgFTNlJX&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBa1fHZqQw___b0lIIcVYmCxTeK3bKFsmkpiIwO4M9BNw&oe=6672BF37)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=-1J-jhZC_YQQ7kNvgGQKDNM&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDpcsDRO5COMlNnZIw53pKVsV_lC47TgaendsX7h6OTcg&oe=6672CCD2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1M9OiHf4Uo0Q7kNvgFjdCL5&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAqG-Yu82cc_v9B_ahyID8b1eveaIhWdRtdRzhHCr2gHw&oe=6672B809)
